item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, August 31, 2024 at 2:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Orphaning bcachefs-tools in Debian (110 points | 73 comments)
2. Is my vision that bad? No, it's just a bug in Apple's Calculator (398 points | 163 comments)
3. Crows are even smarter than we thought (425 points | 226 comments)

6. Google Cloud: synchronous disk replication (49 points | 5 comments)
7. Rediscovering the Small Web (2020) (144 points | 24 comments)
8. Building Bubbletea Programs (48 points | 12 comments)

12. Expect – Linux tool for automating interactive programs (140 points | 76 comments)

23. Radiance Cascades: A Novel High-Res Sol. For Multidim Non-LTE Radiative Transfer (20 points | 7 comments)

25. Experience the Apollo 11 Lunar Landing (219 points | 48 comments)

27. To Nerves from Elixir (132 points | 32 comments)
28. FCast: Casting Made Open Source (191 points | 49 comments)
29. Five Most Productive Years: What Happened and What's Next (103 points | 51 comments)
30. Portraits of insects reveal the intricacies of a world (81 points | 24 comments)
